Description:
Responsibilities:Oversee the overall project management, ensuring that milestones are met, and deliverables are completed on time and within budget.
Build and maintain relationships with key stakeholders, including investors, partners, suppliers, and regulatory authorities.
Collaborate with the interdisciplinary team, including engineers and designers, to ensure that business objectives align with product development and design goals.
Develop and manage the budget, financial projections, and other key performance indicators (KPIs) to ensure the financial sustainability and progress of the project.
Analyze market trends, competitor products, and customer feedback to inform strategic decision-making and product enhancements.
Assist in developing and refining the business model for a drug delivery device, identifying opportunities for revenue generation, cost optimization, and market expansion.Requirements:Bachelor's or Master's degree in Business Administration, Management, or a related field; an additional degree in Engineering, Life Sciences, or Healthcare would be a plus
Significant experience in a management role within the medical device or healthcare industry, preferably with experience in bringing products to market.
Strong project management, strategic planning, and organizational skills
Proven ability to develop and execute successful medical device projects.
Experience in managing budgets, financial planning, and investor relations.
Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills
Ability to work effectively with an interdisciplinary team in a fast-paced, deadline-driven environment.
Passion for improving healthcare access and outcomes for underserved populations.Job Details
